title: Cannot believe this
author: VD
content_html:
But I can’t find my copy of “The Road to Serfdom” anywhere. If you’ve got a copy on hand – and I know someone here does – and have about 10 minutes to spare, please let me know here and I’ll email you a request.

UPDATE – Unrelated, but unbelievably awesome!
